canMove() - Method in class dkeep.logic.GameObject
 
carryKey() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Hero
changes hero symbol and key variable value accordingly to getting key action
changeDoors() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Game
Unlocks(opens) all current game doors
changeOpenedState() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Door
This function only exists for further override on derived classes
changeOpenedState() - Method in class dkeep.logic.DoorClosed
The closed door changes its instance to an open door
changeOpenedState() - Method in class dkeep.logic.DoorOpened
The open door changes its instance to a closed door
Character - Class in dkeep.logic
Represents a game character, derives from GameObject
Character(Point, char, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Character
Character constructor, calls the GameObject constructor All characters are alive when created
Character.State - Enum in dkeep.logic
Used to express a character state in the game
Club - Class in dkeep.logic
Represents the ogre's weapon, extends GameObject The club representation symbol is '*' A club is both passable and movable
Club(Point) - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Club
Club constructor, calls the GameObject constructor
Collision - Class in dkeep.logic
Represents an overlap between a key and an ogre, or between a key and a club The collision representation symbol is '$' A collision is passable, but not movable Extends GameObject
Collision(Point) - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Collision
collision constructor, calls the GameObject constructor
createDungeon(int, int[][]) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Game
Creates a matrix composed by all game elements represented by objects
createMovement() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Character
This function only exists for further override on derived classes
createMovement() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Guard
generates the next guard movement
createMovement() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Ogre
generates the next ogre movement
currentLevel - Variable in class dkeep.logic.GameState
Indicates the current level
